main event: On July 5, 1955, a white round object was tracked on ground radar in Penbrook, Pennsylvania at an estimated velocity of 40,000 mph for approximately 8 minutes.
interesting points: The object was tracked on ground radar as a fast-moving target., It was described as approximately 1 hour in appearance duration., The object continued on a straight course during the observation period., The witness had experience as Chief Observer of a Civilian Defense Aircraft Observation Post., The document is part of Project Blue Book which investigated UFO sightings.
witness description: The witness was a chemist and a supervisor of the O.B. with experience in observing aircraft.
